divs: Sighting DetailsThis Airplane-like object came out of the sky at a tremendous speed. I saw a redcreature with horns, fangs, wavy, red skin, bright green clothes, and completelyblue eyesin the window. there was a spear-like object under each wing, one ofwich fired. upon touching the ground, it distinegrated.
